name: DuplicateResult

methods.name: getDuplicateRule
methods.description: Returns the developer name of the executed duplicate rule that returned duplicate records.

methods.name: getErrorMessage
methods.description: Returns the error message configured by the administrator to warn users they may be creating duplicate records. This message is associated with a duplicate rule.

methods.name: getMatchResults
methods.description: Returns the duplicate records and match information.

methods.name: isAllowSave
methods.description: Indicates whether the duplicate rule will allow a record thatâ€™s identified as a duplicate to be saved. Set to true if duplicate rule should allow save; otherwise, false.

description: Represents the details of a duplicate rule that detected duplicate records and information about those duplicate records.
